ygData.subject: RE: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: yah this happened to me a long time ago, got GG d from the ogre camp in west karana with half a bubb and reappeared in same spot with full health, which let me
ygData.messageBody:
yah this happened to me a long time ago, got GG'd from the ogre camp in west
karana with half a bubb and reappeared in same spot with full health, which
let me run away fast. everyone else had successfully zoned, so i probably
died during.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: Jesse <j@...>
>
>
> > Folks, there are three different things going on here.
>
> Four, I'd say.
>
> 4. Hunting deep in a dungeon. Situation turns bad, EVAC is yelled.
> Druid/wizard casts evacuate. You have plenty of HP when you get the
> LOADING, PLEASE WAIT... message. Then after a normal zone load time,
> you're dumped back into the room you just left, in the same
> spot, with a
> LOT of angry mobs. Proceed to die.
>
